alert.note: Alert for Dallam (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 6:27PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Dallam County through 730 PM CDT... At 626 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Texline, or 19 miles southeast of Clayton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Texline and Ware. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
